main_definition: A small, rectangular piece of thick paper intended to be sent through the mail without an envelope, usually displaying a picture or message on one side.

meanings_and_examples.example: She mailed the postcard from Paris to her family back home.
He collected various postcards featuring famous landmarks during his travels around Europe.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal term for a brief note or message
meanings_and_examples.example: She left a quick note on the office postcard, congratulating her teammate on their promotion.
